# Read BPRSL data
```{r}
BPRL <- read.table("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/KimmoVehkalahti/MABS/master/Examples/data/BPRS.txt", sep=" ", header=TRUE)
str(BPRL)
```

```{r}
summary(BPRL)
```

# Read BPRSL data
```{r}
RATS <- read.table("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/KimmoVehkalahti/MABS/master/Examples/data/rats.txt", sep="\t", header=TRUE)
str(RATS)
```

**These data are treatment and groups**

# Convert the categorical variables of both sets to factors
```{r}
BPRL$treatment <- factor(BPRL$treatment)
BPRL$subject <- factor(BPRL$subject)
```
```{r}
str(BPRL)
```


```{r}
RATS$Group <- factor(RATS$Group)
RATS$ID <- factor(RATS$ID)
```
```{r}
str(RATS)
```
